name: Mario Kart™: Super Circuit
description: The Mario Kart series’ first handheld outing is as fun, lightning-fast and crazy as ever! Mario Kart: Super Circuit takes the best elements of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64, and turbo-charges them with 20 brand new tracks plus 20 classic tracks for experts to unlock. All the regular characters are here; including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Wario and more; and your favourite items like Red Shells, Bananas and the much-feared Spiny Shell!
